description:
'''Born of Osiris''' is an American [[progressive metalcore]] band formed in 2003 in [[Palatine Township, Cook County, Illinois|Palatine]], [[Illinois]], a suburb of [[Chicago]]. The band currently consists of drummer and sole remaining founding member Cameron Losch, lead vocalist Ronnie Canizaro, and guitarist Nick Rossi. Born of Osiris has played at various festivals including the [[Summer Slaughter Tour]] (2008, 2009, 2015 and 2018) and the [[Music as a Weapon]] Tour 4.

The group underwent several name changes before finally settling on Born of Osiris in 2007, basing the name on the Egyptian deity [[Osiris]] and the tale of his son [[Horus]].
